problem_text: Find the perimeter of the \triangle W Z X, if \triangle W Z X \sim \triangle S R T, S T = 6, W X = 5, and the perimeter of \triangle S R T = 15.
compact_text: Find the perimeter of the \triangle WZX, if \triangle WZX \sim \triangle SRT, ST = 6, WX = 5, and the perimeter of \triangle SRT = 15.
annotat_text: Find the perimeter of the $\triangle WZX$, if $\triangle WZX \sim \triangle SRT$, $ST=6, WX=5$, and the perimeter of $\triangle SRT=15$.
